首選好食道 search stars Message
//common_add_message Leave a message Leave your opinion of this restaurant! In addition to communicating with other people, you can also write down the comments of the restaurant, make the restaurant better. How do you feel about this restaurant? Very good, will come again so so message confirm cancel //common_opinion Give feedback Through this interface, you can report problems to us, propose functional suggestions, make general advice and ideas. Name Cellphone Email Opinion Note: Please be sure to write the e-mail,the customer service staff will reply to you by mail. Send //common_search area New Taipei Taipei category American Japan Korea Hongkong Italy Chinese Dessert Ice search //common_search_info1 Restaurant type area address Public transportation Telephone Business hours Seats Remarks About //common_search_info2 Menu Popular meal //common_search_info3 / manager_search_info3 / restaurant_message stars" Instant message Leave a message Message content" Date Delete The average of stars" (The average of stars by all the memeber) Message of member //common_search_info4 address Business hours Telephone Distance //common_setting font size switch Give feedback //manager Manager Auditing restaurant Recommed attractions Give feedback Settings Sign out //manager_advice_card_view_row account opinion //manager_audit_confirm Please check the restaurant is physical store or not.Telephone.address and area is it real.And specified photos have put or not. application time restaurant name telephone area address category Email restaurant pictures (Need restaurant sign,restaurant outside and inside photos.) Approved Not approved //manager_audit_confirm_no why not approved send cancel //manager_recommend_add/manager_recommend_modify Add Attractions Update Attractions Complete Attraction name Address Telephone Distance Business hours Attractions pictures //manager_recommend_card_view Area Category Search //manager_recommend_content_card_view Restaurant name //member Let me help you decide Promotions History My favourite Member //member_promotions_card_view_row restaurant Discount content Time limit //member_promotions_information To This button must be clicked by the restaurant clerk, if you click on it, you will not be able to get the discount receive //restaurant Restaurant Update restaurant information Member feedback remove the cooperation //restaurant_add_promotions Add new discount Discount content (If there is no picture, please use the restaurant avatar.) Time limit Start date End date Release //restaurant_into 建立更新餐廳介紹 Complete (*Required information) *Restaurant name *Category *Area *Address *Public transportation *Telephone *Business hours Seats Remarks *About *Restaurant Avatar *Menu (Meal name, price) Text Picture *Popular meal *Meal photo(Up to 6 photos) *Restaurant inside and outside photos outside photos(Need restaurant sign,up to 3 photos) inside photos(Up to 3 photos) //restaurant_promotions_card_view Currently of discount Restaurant name Discount content Time limit //visiter Visiter Log in Restaurant search Sign up //visiter_forgetpassword Forget password cellphone Send verification code Enter verification code authenticating //visiter_login Account Password Log in Connect to Facebook Connect to Gmail Sign up Forget password //visiter_member_register Member sign up Name Nickname Account Password Confirm password Birthday Cellphone Email Sign up //visiter_restaurant_register Restaurant sign up Restaurant Name Account Password Confirm password Telephone Area Address Category Email Restaurant photos (Need restaurant sign,restaurant outside and inside photos.)
